website_summaries.verdict: A feature-packed, high-end treadmill with a reasonable price tag.
pros: Has a sturdy, commercial-grade build and motor
Features a high range of inclines from 0 to 12 percent
Has a 10-inch, WiFi-enabled display and numerous workout programs
cons: Issues with the iFit platform crashing have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Nice but squeaks very loudly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill! Gets the job done. I had it assembled via Amazon because I didn't want to take any chances on messing it up. I will say it super squeaky. I'm not sure why. My previous (much cheaper) treadmill didn't squeak. Not really sure what to do to remedy this.
customer_reviews.author: MsBitters

customer_reviews.title: The free iFit membership ISN’T FREE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The machine is great and delivery and set up went very smoothly. HOWEVER, the claim of a free 1-year iFit membership is FALSE! After getting the run around from NordicTrack and iFit, I called Amazon Support. Here’s the deal: the CUSTOMER PAYS UPFRONT FOR THE ONE YEAR IFIT MEMBERSHIP AND THEN SUPPOSEDLY CAN CANCEL A YEAR LATER AND GET THEIR MONEY BACK! To me, that’s a $396 gamble. NO THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Received it and it broke within a week. Nordic ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it and it broke within a week. Nordic sent us a bunch of different parts to fix it but none of them worked and they refused to replace the unit. Out 600 bucks. I cannot say enough to avoid this brand
customer_reviews.author: Bmmsmith

customer_reviews.title: Please please dont buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine absolutely ruined by the software. If you dont want to spend $40 a month you are in for a frustrating and infuriating time. I read the mostly positive reviews, and got one. I wish I hadn't. I had no intention of signing up for iFit because it seems gimmicky. The software pushes iFit sign up so hard it makes the machine almost unusable. Please dont make my mistake thinking I could look past the horrible software, you can't. This is an outright scam.
customer_reviews.author: tlod0813

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating - Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: IFit freezes and crashes constantly - makes it incredibly frustrating to complete a work out. I would Not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Music Matt

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I was looking for and I'm sure I will be happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I received the treadmill today and my husband put it together. It is exactly what I was looking for and I'm sure I will be happy with it. Unfortunately, the bottom right rail next to the track is cracked. The box was damaged as well upon receiving but was unable to see the cracked piece until removing all of the contents. I emailed Nordictrack and am notifying Amazon as well and I'm hoping the piece will be replaced and sent out ASAP. Disappointed to receive a new item damaged but should be an easy fix. Otherwise, I'm anxious to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iFit costs total $350 for a module and subscription
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model 6.5 S on purpose because it said it was compatible with the iFit... I was aware of a monthly iFit subscription of $9.99 a month for 2 years totalling $220 upfront ... however there is no true compatibility and this machine requires an extra iFit module to be purchased for $150... Very misleading in the pictures and the info. Wouldnt have purchased this if was really clear it would take another $350 just to have the iFit work on this machine. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill that morphs into a purse hanger
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has been a disaster from day one. First, it took a month for it to get delivered. Now a month into using the thing and it stops after five minutes of use. Of course this started after the return period lapsed. Now I'm trying to get a hold of the company that handles the warranty and I haven't heard a peep in two weeks. So I just got myself a big ol' hunk of junk that I use to hang my purse on.
customer_reviews.author: Zelly

customer_reviews.title: Ifit plan & horrible customer service (update)
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS.!!! This treadmill was to come with one year ifit plan. To activate said plan you have to put in a charge card well ifit charged my card 396.00 and now I've been waiting 1hr (2 different times) min for someone to pick up the phone to ask why they charged my card . (update) Nordic Trac contacted me and argued with me that iFit was available and then transferred me to the same number that I waited on last time, Nordic Trac customer service is a joke! Should of gone with Rebox like my old one, I am replacing. If you want headaches, order this treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Karsun

customer_reviews.title: Overall a very good product. Be aware that it is huge and ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very good product. Be aware that it is huge and heavy, however. Ideally, assemble it where you plan to keep it. It doesn't fit through doors easily- certainly not with one person moving it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff wofford

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and go to the gym! 10.00 a month at planet fitness is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would buy this for the convenience of rolling out of bed and doing cardio. In only three months of irregular use the belt comes off and gets twisted up as per photo.
customer_reviews.author: OCTAVIO L JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to send this back. I had the guy come to assemble and once he opened it all up there was a hole in the belt. I waited over a month to get it. Very disappointed. The treadmill it self looks well made and nice but due to the damage I have to send back and again it's out of stock. Although Amazon was very helpful with getting me a refund it's a bummer that I still have no treadmill. What a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy colon

customer_reviews.title: so we have a useless, defective treadmill sitting in the room
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged in the box. Motor housing and incline hydraulics damaged. Nordic Track lost our registration, even though we received a confirmation email from them, which evidently had the wrong model and serial numbers listed. Nordic Track has been unable to resolve the issue for us, so we have a useless, defective treadmill sitting in the room. How appalling.
customer_reviews.author: google

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quiet and filled with options
customer_reviews.text: This was everything and more than I expected. Sturdy, quiet and filled with options. I paid to have it put together and the men were so profession and did a great job. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective motor
customer_reviews.text: Defective motor was out on setup. Customer service was not very good. I am stuck with a treadmill until Friday that will not run. Also the treadmill was suppose to come with assembly and shipping. The system didn't work right so we had to wait another week for the technician Tom while he was good he suggested I call Nordic track. 5 hours of calling to find out the machine has a bad motor in it. This was not a good experience! If there was a zero I would put it!
customer_reviews.author: l helton

customer_reviews.title: Pulse sensor wildly erratic. NordicTrack offered bogus solutions; ...
customer_reviews.text: Pulse sensor wildly erratic. NordicTrack offered bogus solutions; ignored request to send someone to repair; and refused to acknowledge that the treadmill is defective. Amazon (thank you) resolved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NordicTrack doesn’t honor the warranty
customer_reviews.text: I received this new treadmill with broken motor hood on 11/26/2018. I contacted Amazon, then NordicTrack support. I made too many calls, chats. I even registered my treadmill with NordicTrack and created a new support order to report the broken hood. Today is December 19, 2018, I have not received any response. What kind of company is that? Sale the product with all warranties and run away?
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t any scratches or dents like others have posted it
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived yesterday and I am very excited to try it out!! I paid extra for the Amazon Assembly because I didn’t want to set it up wrong. I didn’t any scratches or dents like others have posted it. I am giving 4 stars because I think they should have at least included a free trail for IFiT. Other than that I am happy! I will update if anything goes wrong. Great purchase! Fast shipping and great assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Dionndra James

customer_reviews.title: Not a good decision
customer_reviews.text: Machine is noisy. I contacted the company regarding it and another question--the reply was "we will get back to you" and that was weeks ago! The "whine" seems to be the belt or perhaps the motor (that seems to hesitate when first turned on. Also, it "squeaks" when I walk (I weigh 135, and don't use it for running.) I had another brand machine that I had used for over five years and replaced it with this one. Not a good decision. .
customer_reviews.author: Arne E.

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Treadmill did not work from the start. Had to trouble shoot with a customer support rep remotely to find out the motor did not work. So they sent a new motor and a link to a video on how to install (The video is for a different treadmill). After I did install it the belt did not fit correctly. Another 30 minute hold for tech support to tell me to adjust it according to the instruction manual. Disappointed with treadmill but more disappointed with horrible service. Wish zero stars was an option. A nice person on the phone would have been worth 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Runs great when it runs
customer_reviews.text: Runs great when it runs. About every two uses, it blows the power out in the room. We called Nordic Track and were told since our circuit breaker was large enough to accommodate the equipment, we need an "arc filter". After my husband gave the a piece of his mind for not listing that anywhere or including it with the treadmill, they sent us one. The treadmill ran for two days with no power issues but has now blown the power again. Very frustrating to spend this amount of money on something that has caused so much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Works well, don't forget "free" install warranty if you need it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, machine has been in house for a week of steady use between my wife and myself, I did not pay for the "free" installation service, and although it would have saved time, i was able to put it together myself. PRO TIP: one of the last steps is to put the adjustment bar underneath the frame so that you can lock the machine up in place when not in use, do this BEFORE you put on the legs when you can flip the base on its side, this was a pain in the rear attempting to one arm hold the machine up and then unscrew and place that pole in place. I hope this helps! -Mr.J
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Took less time to assemble than it did to unpackage! Easy lift and lowers with an automatic shock. I read previous comments and learned you can skip the ifit registration by simply holding down the ifit (blue) button for about 30 seconds- then you don’t have to pay to subscribe and it works like a regular treadmill. I’d suggest to watch for a good price bcz they seem to list the same product with different prices occasionally. The week before I ordered it was 599, when I ordered it was 679. So far I love it and it’s not holding any clothing yet!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Long

customer_reviews.title: Good decision and quality buy
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was scheduled during checkout and came within 3 business days. Took me 2 hours with a 7 year old and 2 year old helping with a few STOP/leave it alone breaks. When I finished it took seconds to get this turned on and running. The treadmill is quiet smooth walking, faster than I need and overall a cool treadmill. Have not tried the iFit yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Prell

customer_reviews.title: assembly
customer_reviews.text: Warning, treadmill box delivered is 200lbs. Couldn't lift it myself, had to slide the box into the house, but box wouldn't fit through the door. Took treadmill out and slid it on a rug into the room. Assembly instructions were really straightforward. Took me a couple hours. Also, the threads on the 1 silver ground screw were defective, so it wouldn't screw in. This screw is important because it grounds the machine to prevent electric shock. Replacement screw is .99 cents plus shipping. Amazon support credited me for the replacement screw. Will update this review again once I receive the replacement screw. Edit- never received the replacement screw. Bought one from local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill performs well. For my purposes, it is perfect. The uphill function isn’t that great, but it will give a slight incline. The machine is rather loud, so I have to use headphones when I want to watch or listen to anything. Moving it around is a little challenging but I like that it is foldable so it doesn’t take up too much room. I took a star off because the machine was cracked during delivery and they try to trick you into buying a membership to use the machine. There is a very small selection that allows you to bypass the membership to start the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Received broken treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Got the product, and the plastic frame around the belt was broken. I will update my review once I receive the new one in (hopefully) new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Watson

customer_reviews.title: POTENTIAL BUYERS -PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING!!
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, I expected far more ‘advanced technology’. Seems like this might’ve been made in the early 90s?.. Just an aux connection? Not a pile of dodo by any means though, it’s actually easy to assemble and somewhat durable. BUT - the cost is far too high because you WILL NEVER get your ROI here. Joining a gym would be a better idea. Important to note - this treadmill comes with a few documents asking you to ‘activate the treadmill‘ by going to some IFIT website. IN MY OPINION thats borderline ‘false advertising‘ because it could not be further from the truth. Simply hold the iFit blue button for 30 seconds and you bypass it, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, great treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my home. I'm a fairly large wide-structured man, 6'2" 270 lbs, and I am able to run, jog, and walk without any issues or problems on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bypass ifit
customer_reviews.text: You can bypass ifit and activate the treadmill by holding down the ifit button for about 30 seconds. It is such a scam to imply that a membership for ifit is required to activate the treadmill. I started to register for ifit, then stopped immediately when it asked for my credit card info. We were able to successfully activate by holding down the button.
customer_reviews.author: K and E

customer_reviews.title: Wort Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Machine is well built, sturdy and easy to use. ***There are warnings all over the packages and instructions that state that you need to unlock your machine by signing up for an I-Fit membership** THIS IS NOT TRUE. All you need to do is: After the machine is assembled, Turn on the machine, press and hold the i-Fit button for 30 seconds, the machine will reset and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dibonas

customer_reviews.title: bad assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions to the letter. Then, in step 16, instructions tells me to install covers over frame base. This step requires me to dissemble about 3/4 of what I just put together--this should have been step 2, not step 16. I am very irritated. I just left the covers off as they are purely cosmetic. Also the left tray would not attach because screw points were missing/broken off. So I glued it. Activation with ifit looked like it was going to be a bitch, but it turns out there is a bypass.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan T. Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I think Nordic track is one of the worst company to do deal with
customer_reviews.text: No owners guide inside the box or anywhere, tried calling Nordic track but their recording I must register the treadmill first on their website,did that and no one called or respond to my requests , and after 10 days of waiting I called them and I was put on hold for 45 minuets to no solution to my problem!!!! I think Nordic track is one of the worst company to do deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shaow

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Manufacturing Defect 2020
customer_reviews.text: This review is more of a warning for buyers in early 2020. Apparently there was a manufacturing issue with this model and an entire row of buttons is missing. I had this with 2 of them, so I would assume all that were produced around the same time have this problem. Amazon was great and sent the replacement and then ultimately picked them both up. First photo is what I received, 2nd is what it should have. There was no way to set a workout without these buttons. If you rubbed your fingers across the area you can feel where the buttons should be, but they did not function.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I've had better.
customer_reviews.text: Ok it is fine. Skip the sub junk and hold the button down for apx. 30 seconds. WHOEVER the cross eyed s.o.b that was in charge of pre drilling holes the day mine was made needs to be fired. I fought this thing like it owed me money.
customer_reviews.author: TheCrowHouse

customer_reviews.title: Nice Treadmill for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I picked this one after studying so many of them. For $599 you get a quality treadmill with a very basic information screen. Treadmill section is high quality. However that basic 5" screen will display everything you'll need to know during your workout. And believe me when I say "you DO NOT have to register for, and pay extra for iFit to use this treadmill. Once I first held the iFit button down for about 20 seconds I never had to do that again. Everytime I power it up I get on it, set my speed and start walking.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky The Dog

customer_reviews.title: Just STAY AWAY from NordicTrack and all ICON products
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. It worked great for 2 weeks and dies. Triggered circuit breaker and now won't turn on. Called local equipment repair person and he laughed when I said it was NordicTrack. "They keep me in business," he said. I might consider updating this review but for now, stay away. It's fantastic while it works...too bad it last 13 days...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Britton

customer_reviews.title: Buy a new grounding screw. The one that comes with is defective.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet I just put it together today. But I wanted to write a review about the assembly at least. It was a pain in the ass. I spent way too long on the grounding screw. Had to go to Home Depot and get one that actually fit and fit flush with the arm. So if you’re wondering if you’re doing something wrong, you’re not. Don’t question it. Just get another screw. You’ll also need a ratchet set to tighten like 8 bolts. I assembled everything myself. I’m 5’2” and it was a pain but possible. Once I use it I’ll update this.
customer_reviews.author: RHernandez

customer_reviews.title: squeaking and connection
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad treadmill. The only issue I have is the squeaking noise while walking. When the last tech service came to my house to move from one room to another. I mentioned it to him. He said add oil, I said where? where it squeaks. But this is brand new machine, had not been use because of the location. He just left without solving the issue. The squeak is totally annoying!! I have a question, with the new technology these days, how can you connect you phone to the machine to hear the music through the speakers without signing up for ifit? there is no UBS port but a pinhole. Current smart phone use USB Ports.
customer_reviews.author: amg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate - get this.
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this treadmill for about a month now. I did so much research on treadmills and read so many reviews. The biggest issue I read was people hated the iFit that comes with the Nordertrack. I can honestly say it is my favorite thing about using this treadmill. It motivates me so much more than I realized. Love love love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for to use with Zwift!
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to tell you that I did not even try the iFit trial, so I can not speak to that. I was looking for a good treadmill to use with Zwift and have found this treadmill works perfectly for that. I needed to be able to pair it with the Zwift program and found that the Zwift Runn paired with this treadmill and the speeds matched exactly with no calibration of the Runn needed. I had first tried the Zwift running pod, but found the speeds it recorded were not accurate. I highly recommend this treadmill for indoor running, especially for pairing with the Zwift platform.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this treadmill about 2 weeks in to the gym being shut down during the pandemic. It kept me sane until the gym opened back up and now that the gym is open I still find i am using it quite a bit to jump on it in the middle of the day or when i log off at work at night to get steps in! It is very easy to use and i did NOT purchase the NordiTrack software it said you "have" to buy. I read a review on here that showed you how to bi-pass it and i have had no issues. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh S

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews, I decided to take a chance on a treadmill I was not able to actually test out in person...happy so far, except for the weird stuff required for activation, signing up with IFIT-which I have no interest in continuing with. The good thing, is, I did not have to give IFIT my credit card info. I was really amazed at the quality of the treadmill and how big it actually was. My husband put it together in about an hour. Have only had this for about a week, so will add more to my review if I have more to say-good or bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Delivered broken and belt will not move when turned on. Very disappointed - now I have to take my time to contact support for an almost $700 product. I will revise my review if issue is solved.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Nordic T7.5
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We love it. Well built very sturdy. It runs very well. Incline and decline is quick as well as speed change. We did get the amazon guys to assemble it. Donald and Kenyatta (Houston Texas) both of this guys were great, professional and able to put the machine with no problem. They did help us move this machine inside the house. I would recommend this 2 guys awesome job.
customer_reviews.author: Tamzi

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in January of 2020. I have been using it 2-3 times a week for exercises. One fine day this week it stopped working. The I-fit screen would not come up. The fan , the incline works but the treadmill won't start and the screen doesn't come up. PATHETIC . Not even 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: DONT SIGN UP FOR iFIT
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to sign up for the iFit program so all you have to do to get around that is press and hold the iFit Bluetooth symbol next to the phone and iPad symbol (it doesn’t look like an actually button to press but that’s what you have to touch) and it went to the home screen! Super easy to assemble. I do have a complaint tho, my delivery wasn’t the best experience. They scuffed up my trim when they put it into the room and the box was damaged and dented in multiple places. Definitely not professional.
customer_reviews.author: Asha S

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Mom of a toddler here: this is the only way I get in a workout without spending half of the day packing driving and baby prepping for a gym trip. So far it seems very sturdy and works well. I skipped the iFit subscription because I hear its garbage, but I didn’t get the treadmill for that. Paid for amazon assembly. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Bradshaw&Palmer

customer_reviews.title: TO ACTIVATE: HOLD BLUE BUTTON
customer_reviews.text: This dumb company makes you give them your credit card number and sign up for a free trial before telling you how to unlock the treadmill. Hold the blue button for 30 seconds. There, now you can use your treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: mass1338

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this product
customer_reviews.text: Wow. It's impossible for me to write a full review because I've been trying to assemble this product for the past five hours. I'm a reasonably smart guy. I have an advanced degree and I spent more then a decade turning wrenches as an enlisted soldier in the Army so I thought this would be no problem to assemble. Couldn't have been more wrong. This device has the worst assembly instructions I've ever seen. Absolutely incomprehensible diagrams. Do not buy this if you plan on assembling it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lyngaas

customer_reviews.title: Ifit Scam
customer_reviews.text: Beware! In order to get the treadmill to run, you have to register with iFit and then give them your cc information for a free trial after which you will be charged a monthly fee of $15. One reviewer wrote that you can actually activate the machine without registering. Unfortunately, I didn't read his review until after I gave my credit card information and registered. Forcing buyers to buy another product in order for the product they've already PURCHASED merits a one-star review. I will NEVER use iFit and I will cancel my subscription ASAP because of these unethical practices. The treadmill itself seems solid. Installation wasn't the easiest, but the instructions were decent and the parts were well organized.
customer_reviews.author: William Arsenis

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery, no damage, very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was near perfect, the dudes should have had masks on, but it was on time, well communicated through the chat feature in the app. It's a lot to put together and you need a pal, but it is totally doable. Some screws and bolts need a LOT of elbow grease, but it comes together solidly. It was WELL packaged and not a scratch or scrape. I think maybe they've improved the packaging since so many were received damaged. Holding down the ifit button bypassed that nonsense just fine. We use it every day and it is an excellent value for us. We are shocked by how quiet it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this treadmill for a while and I’m happy I pulled the trigger! My treadmill did arrive damaged, but Nordic’s customer service was excellent and they had a replacement piece sent out to my house as soon as possible. I did see a few reviews say that the ifit membership was required in order to use the treadmill, but that’s definitely not the case. Once the treadmill is powered on, hold down the ifit button for 30 seconds and then your treadmill is ready to be used without having to pay for the membership fee.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Picano

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery drivers notified me when they were on the way, the box was in pristine condition, it was on time, and the instructions were very straight forward. It runs perfectly and is exactly what I wanted. There are two cons: 1. You must have a second person to put this together. 2. NordicTrack makes you think you have to register for their iFit program for your treadmill to even turn on. This is not true. You can bypass the registration process by just turning the machine on, putting the safety stopper fab into its place and holding down the iFit button.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Never worked and extended warranty unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I purchased this treadmill and the belt never stayed where it was supposed to be. I purchased an extended warranty and asked them to repair. They said it was A KNOWN PROBLEM and sent me two screws to put into the treadmill. There are no screw holes where these are supposed to fit. As if today, I have made many requests for warranty repair service but they have not responded. Total ripoff and appalling customer service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Requires $180 module if you want to use iFit feature
customer_reviews.text: Like the treadmill so far. The super easy lowering and folding are great. However, although I was aware I would need an iFit subscription to use the iFit feature, I was surprised and disappointed that the iFit feature also requires an iFit module, which is sold separately for an additional $180! I definitely recommend the Amazon assembly. The guy that came out was quick, personable and knowledgeable as he had assembled several before.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bought this, then price changed by $196.00. Price adjustment denied. Not right!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this treadmill Sunday evening, Aug 16, it delivered today, Saturday, August 22. I just had it assembled. I just looked online to get the name of the app and see it is 196.00 cheaper, same seller, and Amazon rep said they don't honor lower prices post Purchase. I opened a cc with Amazon to get this treadmill. I am a widow and had someone assemble it. I wanted to get exercise since I've been this house for almost six months now, assemblers cut up boxes, and no way to return.
customer_reviews.author: rainison

customer_reviews.title: Do it
customer_reviews.text: Literally would purchase 4266284 times over. I despise running with a passion and I am now running between 10-20 miles a week which is unheard of for me. I love the recorded sessions, and I am absolutely in love with the fact that the instructor controls the incline and speed. I think over time I will go ahead and purchase the more expensive version but at this time this is absolutely perfect for my beginner/intermediate running level. I’m slowly climbing the classes intensities and am beyond happy. A piece arrive broken and the customer service was prompt and sent me a new piece immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: So my wife and I purchased this on 5/31/20. I wanted to give it some time after I wrote a review. The IFIT is a great tool, however we noticed that while the machine is adjusting on the inclines per the program, the treadmill itself is making a loud clank per the adjustment. Overall it’s only been a couple of months and I’m definitely not happy with the product after weve spent 1100 on what we thought would be a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Caden

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I guess i didn't know what i was missing! I had an old treadmill for a long time before i bought this new NordicTrack. Wow....what was i thinking not buying a new treadmill sooner? this thing is so nice. it's quiet and feels amazing to run on. The iFit feature is so nice. It has so many levels of fitness that literally anyone can use it. I love this thing! I also paid for Amazon to come to my home and build it. WORTH EVERY SINGLE PENNY. The guy was in and out in 45 mins. He clearly knew what he was doing. Very professional as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nordictrack has awful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill itself is mediocre at best. But for the price what can one expect? Even with that being said I would have given the treadmill a 4 star alone. BUT, if you have to deal with Nordictrack customer service for any reason... you will wait on hold forever.. be transferred from one person to another...only to think your question was answered and find out it was not and have to repeat the process over and over again for nearly a month!!! Worst experience ever!
customer_reviews.author: RGRose

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size Description
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for days to buy a treadmill and I decided to get this particular one because the description says 22X55 tread belt and that was a decision maker to me ... well the belt is like most of the other treadmills in the market which is 20X50 ... I just hate when they don't tell you the real deal ...
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Treadmill for tall people
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both tall people (5'10", 6'3" respectively) and I big concern about purchasing a treadmill for home use was that it would be too small for our long legs. We researched, read hundreds of reviews and bit the bullet. We could not be happier with this treadmill. It's a good size for the home but is still plenty long enough for a full stride. It folds up well and takes up minimal space when not in use. Overall, an excellent machine and one we both would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine; HATE the iFit
customer_reviews.text: The iFit setup is a mess! Can't seem to register to activate the code, can't add secondary users on the family membership, and then get an email congratulation me on the first workout (on the plan that I couldn't register!). No technical support from iFit to speak of. If you want a solid treadmill with some basic workouts, this one will do the job. If you want the enhanced features of iFit, plan to pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaK

customer_reviews.title: Rewarding encouragement to go as far as you can
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wheelchair bound for 5 years, then used a walker. Remain unstable on a cane. This treadmill can be set to 0.5 speed setting. Warning always start the warmup and trail with feet straddling the track. The video gives me focus to keep going. A mirror in front helps with foot placement. Started doing just the warmup. Now up to 15 minutes at speed 1. For me I see my feet work better going up hill. Taught me to add stretches to improve walking on level ground. I may walk again normally with practice.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just received and had my machine installed yesterday. Haven't quite used it but can't wait to. When I tried it, it's everything I was hoping for. Again, I haven't fully used it so nothing has gone wrong. One thing I will point out is that it's noisy. You will hear it from one room to another to another, unless you have a huge home. I am going to say thiat if you have it in the home, and you try to workout in the morning, whomever is sleeping will definately hear it. Other than that, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: As many people have been doing, my wife and decided to cancel our gym memberships and invest in our own workout equipment. This NordicTrack has proven to be worth the investment. We both feel much more motivated to go for a walk or run knowing we can go downstairs and hop on the treadmill. It is easy to use and many different pre-set workouts. It was easy to put together (definitely requires two people) and easy to fold up if required. If you're looking to cancel your gym memberships and workout at home, this is a great product for you!
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Put key in, hold  I FIT button 30 sec.
customer_reviews.text: Put key in, hold I FIT button 30 sec. I FIT is gone. Enjoy your new treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Peatea

customer_reviews.title: Cracks and difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: Putting the treadmill together was difficult due to several screw holes not compatible. After fully assembling and inspecting the treadmill, we found that there were two large cracks - one on teh back of the display assembly and one at the bottom left rear "foot". We do not want to try to disassemble and return the beast but we are extremely disappointed to spend this much money to have a broken piece of machinery (and we hope the broken foot doesn't impact safety or stability). The treadmill works well and we are happy with it's function, but having it cracked is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this treadmill not a bunch to assemble took my husband about 20 minutes to set up and we used it right away with no problems. The quality is exceptional. Came really fast even during quarantine. Happy customer. No fan but it’s still a great product
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Arther

customer_reviews.title: Great home treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is a great home treadmill. It took me about an hour to assemble. Instructions are straight forward. You will need someone to assist when installing the locking bar. Speakers are adequate; you will need an aux cord. You will find that there is a lot of literature indicating the treadmill is locked until the ifit app is activated. Fear not, after you assemble it, just press the ifit button for about 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Poorly machined / engineered - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: 3 of 4 screws for the cross bar do not fit making the treadmill un-usable. See photos. Even with the cross bar removed, these 3 screws do not fit. It really would be easy for NordicTrack to figure out standard bolts or screws for the entire machine rather than unique screws and bolts for each section. Be ready to find alternative screws that fit for the cross bar. Regarding the instructions, it is passable but NordicTrack should hire a person from Lego or even IKEA that knows how to write instructions. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Functionality
customer_reviews.text: For this price, I'm not sure you could get something much better. Has a good range of speed up to 10mph which is plenty for my purposes. Also, you DO NOT need to subscribe to iFit to use this. Once plugged in and turned on, simply press and hold the iFit button until the screen comes on and it's ready for use. Maybe ~20-30 seconds. Feels very sturdy and the cup holders are large enough to put a 32oz water bottle. Overall a great purchase, especially with payment installment options.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S

customer_reviews.title: New Treadmill did not work, NordicTrack did not honor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: NordicTrack T7.5S treadmill did not work. Icon Fitness charged me $159.00 for work covered by both factory warranty and extended warranty. I called Icon Fitness for Technical assistance and Ms. Brittney Baker insisted that no on-site technical assistance would be forth coming unless I provided my credit card number. The treadmill was delivered on January 15, 2020 and was finally repaired on April 24, 2020. The extended warranty cost $96.57 and that should have covered necessary replacement of the "pulse bar".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screws dont fit !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I writing this as I'm assembling the machine right now and I'm borderline losing my mind. Some of the screws don't fit and I actually had to find alternate screws to fit. Thank God I actually had some screws lying around the house that actually fit. Particularly steps 3 and 8, the ground screw wouldn't fit and the screws for the crossbar to the handles wouldn't fit. I'll update my review once I use it once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: james zhang

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Track quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the Nordic Track T 6.5 S treadmill. I upgraded from a 6 year old Horizon T101 that I had some major problems with over the years that included an expensive control board replacement and ultimately the motor quit. Huge pluses for the Nordic Track are the quality of construction, the options for various programs and the 25 year motor warranty. Another design feature I noticed is the tread is trimmed less wide so it won't fray along the edges. This was a problem with my old treadmill that caused dust and lint balls. So, very happy about the Nordic Track quality and design. And, assembly was easy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!  Only 8 months old giving it away to goodwill or throwing it away!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a life one for 16 years worked forever sold it to buy this which stopped working in 7 months , I called and they were unhelpful! The part is on back order going on 4 months seems it’s a problem for a lot of clients, I call I get out on an indefinite hold, and then it hangs up! I’m frustrated why amazon would allow this vimos y yo do business with them , I bought extended warranty and nothing happens because there is no part there is no help, nothing! DONT BUY THIS SERIOUSLY A WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6", 125 pounds and this treadmill works very well for me. It has basic functions but I use the manual mode mostly anyway. No fan.....which is a bummer. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's difficult to move the treadmill when I want to store it upright. It has 2 small wheels on the distal part of the rear support that frankly do nothing. To get the treadmill to move it leaves marks from the front end all over my flooring. I've tried those mover cups underneath the front but to no avail. Anyway, I di like the treadmill so far for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Roe

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill! (Bypass monthly subscription)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about six months ago and LOVE it! I assembled it myself and it probably took a few hours, but it can be done with one person, although it would be easier with two. Also, the instructions claim that the treadmill is "locked" and must be "registered" and when you go to register it, they'll insist that you sign up for a monthly subscription program with various workouts, etc, for an additional monthly cost. I didn't want this, so I contacted them and learned that if you turn on the treadmill and hold down on the ifit button for 20 seconds, it'll unlock your treadmill and you can use freely. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: KCReader

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to get a 1 year membership with my purchase - the card/code must be invalid as the iFIT app was not functioning until I provided my CC information and paid $432 for a one year membership, that is not free! I think it's false advertising... so I chatted with Amazon rep and was informed my question was being pass along to NordicTrack, it's been 5 days and not a word from anyone - very sad customer service. On another note, the Amazon assembly was difficult to schedule (had to reschedule 3 times) although the final assembly looks fine. So, beware - the NordicTrack seems ok, the membership is a cheat, and the assembly is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Davies

customer_reviews.title: Love this treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a different treadmill and it wasn't quite what I wanted so I saw this NordicTrack one and at the time was at a great price. It does everything I want and I love it. Easy to use setting with the speed settings and automatic incline. I have not hooked up to the fitness programs yet but I wanted a treadmill since I am not entirely comfortable going to the gym. Instillation does take a bit more time with this one but works great. It is heavy and big so you will need some help with this. There was a damaged piece with delivery but I submitted to them and they replaced it quickly. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni K.

customer_reviews.title: Running
customer_reviews.text: I've seen that this is a walking treadmill, but I use it to run on every day! I'm not a world record holding sprinter or anything, but it does the job! It only goes up to 10mph, but I definitely don't need it to really go any faster. I run ~4-5 miles a day on it and it holds up! It folds super easily, its on hydraulics. There's a ledge to hold my phone/ipad and lots of cupholder space.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a little over 3 months now and have been using it 2 to 3 times a week. There was a software update done recently and it has free video "walks" and runs with trainers in HD that make this an awesome treadmill. I said "walk" in parenthesis because speeds of 6+ are runs for me, lol. You don't have to subscribe to anything to use this or see the videos. I also love the graphs that show you the speed and incline path that is coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill: Stay on your workouts.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, with Covid around and gyms closed, this has been my go to for indoor running. I love the programs, the style and size. The PRICE is amazing. The only thing is you need to register to their program. I'd you're looking to save money, this program will help you save more money than a LA Fitness membership. I have recommended this machine to others and I recommend it to everyone, specially to those missing the treadmill and those who are in their weight loss journey. Another Note: If you're a outdoor runner, I recommend this for you. Mainly because of the bad air quality from the wildfires.
customer_reviews.author: Mathieu Pelletan

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was pretty easy to assemble, only took me about an hour or so if you have the right tools. It says that you need to go to ifit.com/activate to use it but you really don't. You can bypass that requirement easy by holding down the fitbit icon for 15 secs and the treadmill will unlock. Make sure you have the emergency key attached once you do it. Overall, I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa W.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE -- THIS IS A NORDIC TRAC SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Nordic Trac shame on you!!!! Suffered for two days trying to figure out how to get this thing running. Finally I read another customer's review. He/she figured out how to bypass this whole rigamarole by holding IFIT button down for 30 seconds. It bypasses all the IFIT membership BS and starts the treadmill. I hope it works and is not the dud that other customers say it is. AMAZON'S CHOICE????? REALLY???
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hofen

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: It was a long winter and if I was going to look decent in a bikini, I needed some extra help. Due to this coronavirus, I should be working out after work, but alas here we are. For the money, this was a steal at $600 with tax. I'm not going to be doing anything more than fast walking. Won't be jogging or running because I don't want to die just yet. It folds up nicely and putting it together wasn't too horrible. This is why I have a boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: blm

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult, time consuming product to assemble
customer_reviews.text: A handy person with good tools assembled it for me. He worked non-stop for three hours following the directions and not wasting any time. I couldn't have done it...too complicated and required too much physical strength. It had three red signs that said, Stop call if you are having problems rather than to send it back. Once assembled, it requires connecting to the internet to unlock it. That makes no sense. On the positive side, it functions well and is a good size for a home treadmill and while not quiet, it was quieter operating than other home treadmills I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Scam company. You don’t need to register for ifit to make it work.
customer_reviews.text: This company is scamming people into registering for ifit and paying extra for a treadmill that’s already not worth the price. They mislead you into believing it won’t work without ifit. They should be sued for that alone. Also they give you the wrong screws which make it IMPOSSIBLE to put together yourself. I had some extra in the house so I used them instead. If I’m paying Over $600 for something I expect to have the correct items to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Farwa Hasnain

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Android OS is slow and laggy, often freezes up during workout, treadmill will come to a complete stop after starting workout almost making me fall. The thing is just junk, if it wasn't 300lbs I would have sent it back but stuck with it now. Garbage, avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted. I love the Bluetooth capability. I love that loud speaker it has and the fan that blows air in your face when you’re sweating and the fancy touch screen with workouts. I opted not to do the ifit. The machine works great so far. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflymm Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this treadmill a lot! I'd done my research so my expectations were high, but when I got this assembled it was even nicer than I'd anticipated. It looks great (closer to a gym treadmill than a personal treadmill) and is very comfortable to walk on for long stretches. And I would definitely recommend getting iFit along with it as I'm really enjoying those workouts. The only minor complaint I have is assembly. I'm not technically-inclined so after taking a quick look at all the parts and the instructions, I quickly made an appointment with someone from Task Rabbit to come assemble this for me. However if you are technically-inclined, assembly probably won't be a problem for you.
customer_reviews.author: jane1300

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Equipment
customer_reviews.text: COVID-19 and the temporary closures of gyms, I was motivated to buy a treadmill. I selected Nordic Track because of its high-quality equipment, selection of treadmills and long-standing reputation. I was not disappointed. I choose the T Series 6.5 Si because the Space Saver feature is perfect for me. Now that I have my personal treadmill, I workout 4 to 5 times a week. Whereas before I had to push myself to go to the gym 3 times a week, maybe. When I use the Nordic Track It's running smoothly and it's reasonably quiet. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the assembly, let’s face it , anything this large is difficult to put together. This has been an amazing experience. Deliver showed up on time. Box was well put together to be able to find parts. I wish putting the tread to it’s up position was more assisted. Meaning that I wished it wasn’t so heavy. The iFit is absolutely awesome. Trainer talk to you all the way through your workout. There are also 30 day programs as well. Much different than my last machine that would only turn on and off. Great product and customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Affordable Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality treadmill at a reasonable price. Setup was easy (no harder than assembling a tricky piece of IKEA furniture. Having two people helps). It’s been easy to use, has a variety of speeds, speakers aren’t bad, heart rate monitor seems accurate, and has overall been a quality treadmill that has been a lifesaver right now.
customer_reviews.author: Darthdude

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill once you get through the set-up!
customer_reviews.text: What a pain to put together! Took 3 hours with two people to get the thing assembled. Some holes were the size of pinholes which required light drilling to open just enough for the corresponding screws. However it’s a great treadmill. Just hold the iFit button for 30s and you can bypass all that junk and get to the good stuff, and by good stuff I mean running (or I’m my case, walking for a couple hours while playing dungeons and dragons over my tablet I can conveniently set on the treadmill and plug in via Aux for some surround sound). Happy it’s finally here!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Wrong threads or just poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Threads are the wrong type for the bolts, I'm seeing metal shavings from them when I tighten the bolts. haven't had a chance to actually use the machine yet. Disappointed in this poor quality I bought a name brand to avoid this cheap chinese made crap, but I feel like I'd have been better off buying the cheap chinese made crap, at least it wouldn't have costed as much.
customer_reviews.author: Romrot

customer_reviews.title: Great dust and clothes collector on Earth!
customer_reviews.text: Best dust collector and clothes holder I’ve ever seen. Dust and clothes are literally attracted to it like a moth to a flame! I bought it for my wife who claimed she’d use it all the time. I knew better but still bought it. It has been used exactly 5 times in 3 months. It does seem durable if it ever were to be used.
customer_reviews.author: mrn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was scheduled prior because it's such a big and heavy delivery. Amazon driver delivered it to our garage. Assembly was the hardest part, we are not a handy household, lol. We tried at first by watching youtube videos and following directions. We quit after 2 hours. We ended up using a handy man app, and paid someone to do it. That was the best $120 I ever spent lol. Treadmill runs great, bypassed the fit by holding down the ifit button for 30 secs ( as described in other Amazon reviews) so far we're satisfied. Hopefully I'll lose some of this quarantine weight lol
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy and good for runners!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this treadmill and love it already! This treadmill is pretty solid. I was worried that it might be wobbly but it felt totally balanced. It folds up nicely too. It's definitely not commercial grade but it's the next best thing, especially for the price. It took my husband and a friend about 45 minutes to put it together. Amazon does NOT make it easy to activate your free 1 year membership and still have not gotten that figured out yet. Also, you do NOT need to get ifit to activate. Just hold the ifit bluetooth button for about 10 seconds and that unlocks your tread.
customer_reviews.author: Mel in SR

product_meta.title: T Series 8.5S Treadmill
product_meta.description:
Your NordicTrack T 8.5S Treadmill stands the test of time with innovative design elements and expert engineering. Use your treadmill to go farther than you ever have before when you add NordicTrack Interactive personal coaching experience with IFIT. Get heart-pounding studio workouts and trainer-guided workouts around the globe so you can run the steps of Machu Picchu in the morning and the beaches of Hawaii in the afternoon. Always have confidence in the lasting power of your machine with lifetime frame and motor coverage. 

Continuous Horsepower ("CHP") is a term used in the treadmill industry for consumer comparison purposes. The CHP rating is measured in laboratory testing using a dynamometer, which measures the mechanical power of the motor. The CHP rating does not denote the operational horsepower of the treadmill in ordinary household use. In ordinary household use, the motor does not operate at the horsepower shown.
feature_bullets: Bring Home Interactive Personal Training powered by iFit; 1-year iFit family membership included; create up to 5 individual exercise profiles; Access live, studio, and global workouts ($468 value)
10” HD Interactive Touchscreen Display streams on-demand iFit workouts into your home directly on your treadmill; SMART-Response motor for effective running and cardio training at home
0-12% Digital Quick Incline control; 0-12 MPH Digital QuickSpeed control; Your iFit Trainer auto-adjusts your smart treadmill’s speed and incline for an optimized workout that meets your goals
Innovative SpaceSaver design with EasyLift Assist means your treadmill folds up after your workout for compact, simple storage; 20” x 60” tread belt with FlexSelect cushioning reduces joint impact

300-pound user capacity; Protected with a 10-year frame warranty, 2-year parts warranty, and 1-year labor warranty; NordicTrack is the only authorized seller and Amazon is the only authorized reseller

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
